content:
Subject: User
Purpose: The user greets the assistant with "こんにちは" (Hello) to initiate a conversation.
The subject is Baymax, an AI healthcare companion, and the purpose is to politely ask the user to rate their pain level from 1 to 10.
The subject is the user, and the purpose is to greet the assistant with "こんにちは" (Hello) to start a conversation.
The subject of the utterance is the financial advisor, who is asking the client to provide their basic personal and financial information in order to begin a simulation for asset management planning.
